metadata.title: [2-Pack] Rubber Coupling Hose for Solar Pool Heater Panels - 1.9″ (1-7/8″) I.D.
features: For use with solar pool panels containing a 1-1/2″ I.D. header (1.5″ manifold I.D. / 1.9″ manifold O.D.)
For use with vacuum relief valves or end caps that have a 1.9″ (1-7/8″) O.D.
Molded EPDM rubber hoses designed specifically for use with solar pool heating systems.
Used to connect solar panels to one another, attach end caps and vacuum relief valves. Includes hose-clamp indicator ridges for perfect placement and seal.
Durable UV-resistant EPDM rubber for long life in direct sun. Reinforced center prevents deformation from pressure and vacuum.
description: Molded EPDM rubber hoses designed specifically for use with solar pool heater panels.
Used to connect solar panels to one another, attach end caps and vacuum relief valves.
Available for both 1.5" and 2" header manifolds.

*Only hoses made specifically for pool solar applications should be used for connecting solar pool panels or any necessary hardware. Rubber coupling hoses not designed for this purpose may balloon and explode under the high operating pressure of a solar pool heating system.
Durable UV-resistant EPDM rubber for long life in direct sun.
Durable UV-resistant EPDM rubber for long life in direct sun.
Reinforced center prevents deformation from pressure and vacuum.
Reinforced center prevents deformation from pressure and vacuum.
Hose-clamp indicator ridges for perfect placement and seal.
Hose-clamp indicator ridges for perfect placement and seal.
Hose-clamps sold separately.
Hose-clamps sold separately.
3.75" wide.
3.75" wide.
Compatibility:
Will work with any solar pool heaer panel that has a round 1.5” or 2" I.D. header manifold and makes attachments with rubber hose type connectors.
1.9″ (1-7/8″) I.D. Connector Hose:
For use with solar pool panels containing a 1-1/2″ I.D. header (1.5″ manifold I.D. / 1.9″ manifold O.D.)
For use with solar pool panels containing a 1-1/2″ I.D. header (1.5″ manifold I.D. / 1.9″ manifold O.D.)
For use with vacuum relief valves or end caps that have a 1.9″ (1-7/8″) O.D.
For use with vacuum relief valves or end caps that have a 1.9″ (1-7/8″) O.D.
2.375″ (2-3/8″) I.D. Connector Hose:
For use with solar pool panels containing a 2″ I.D. header (2″ manifold I.D. / 2.375″ manifold O.D.).
For use with solar pool panels containing a 2″ I.D. header (2″ manifold I.D. / 2.375″ manifold O.D.).
For use with vacuum relief valves or end caps that have a 2.375″ (2-3/8″) O.D.
For use with vacuum relief valves or end caps that have a 2.375″ (2-3/8″) O.D.
